dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, Host_B, have you been, uh, following what's happening with digitalization in Kazakhstan? Because, like, Mikheil Lomtadze, he's the CEO of Kaspi.kz, he had some really interesting things to say.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, Host B, have you been, uh, following what's happening with digitalization in Kazakhstan? Because, like, Mikheil Lomtadze, he's the C E O of Kaspi.kz, he had some really interesting things to say.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, yeah, I saw a bit about that! I mean, Kaspi.kz, that's like a huge company now, right? I heard it's one of the biggest retail companies globally, which is, um, pretty wild.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, yeah, I saw a bit about that! I mean, Kaspi.kz, that's like a huge company now, right? I heard it's one of the biggest retail companies globally, which is, um, pretty wild.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Today Kaspi.kz is one of the biggest fintech companies in the world.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Totally! And he actually mentioned that, you know, Kazakhstan has just seen these colossal changes, like, huge advancements in digitalization over the past few years.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally! And he actually mentioned that, you know, Kazakhstan has just seen these colossal changes, like, huge advancements in digitalization over the past few years.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In the last few years Kazakhstan has seen colossal changes in the area of digitalization.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right. And isn't the whole point of it, uh, to make people's lives better? Like, improve the quality of everyday services?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right. And isn't the whole point of it, uh, to make people's lives better? Like, improve the quality of everyday services?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The main goal of digital transformation is to make peoples lives better. To do this it is necessary to improve the quality of services that people regularly use.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! He really emphasized that. And they've been launching service after service, collaborating with, like, tons of different government bodies. Ministry of Digital Development, Finance, even the Ministry of Interior.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! He really emphasized that. And they've been launching service after service, collaborating with, like, tons of different government bodies. Ministry of Digital Development, Finance, even the Ministry of Interior.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We have joint projects with the Ministry of Digital Development, Ministry of Finance, State Revenue Committee, Ministry of Labour, Ministry of the Interior and National Information Technologies JSC.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wow, so it's a really integrated effort then. [overlaps] Like, it's not just one department doing its own thing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow, so it's a really integrated effort then. Like, it's not just one department doing its own thing.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [overlaps] No, not at all! He gave a great example, uh, about vehicle ownership registration.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, not at all! He gave a great example, uh, about vehicle ownership registration.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, apparently, they've completely digitized the whole procedure. And get this, over seven million citizens, uh, use the Kaspi.kz Super App for government services.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, apparently, they've completely digitized the whole procedure. And get this, over seven million citizens, uh, use the Kaspi.kz Super App for government services.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Over 7 million Kazakhstan citizens, our valued customers, visit the Government services section in the Kaspi.kz Super App. We have completely digitized the procedure to change vehicle ownership.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Seven million? That's, that's massive! So, like, how many cars are we talking about, then?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Seven million? That's, that's massive! So, like, how many cars are we talking about, then?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, he said that right now, every third vehicle in Kazakhstan is registered fully online using the Super App.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, he said that right now, every third vehicle in Kazakhstan is registered fully online using the Super App.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: At this moment, every third vehicle in the country is registered fully online using the Kaspi.kz Super App, said Mikheil.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [gasps] Wow. Every third one! That's, that's pretty incredible for, like, a digital transformation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow. Every third one! That's, that's pretty incredible for, like, a digital transformation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and it's considered unique by global standards, too. Another big one: child social security benefits are also moving online now.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and it's considered unique by global standards, too. Another big one: child social security benefits are also moving online now.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This is a unique by global standards. ... Mikheil Lomtadze also commented that the application for child social security benefits is also moving online.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, that's huge! So, parents don't have to go to like, a Public Service Centre with all the paperwork?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, that's huge! So, parents don't have to go to like, a Public Service Centre with all the paperwork?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Nope! Just fill out the application online on the app. It means, you know, more time with their kids instead of, uh, doing bureaucracy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Nope! Just fill out the application online on the app. It means, you know, more time with their kids instead of, uh, doing bureaucracy.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Parents no longer need to visit the Public Service Centre and present paper documents. Just fill in the application online on the Kaspi.kz Super App. Now parents can spend more time with their children instead of visiting Public Service Centre to do legal paperwork, - added Mikheil.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: That's a massive quality-of-life improvement, right there. I mean, that's the whole goal.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's a massive quality-of-life improvement, right there. I mean, that's the whole goal.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. And President Tokayev even, like, publicly acknowledged their success, saying everyone needs to accept this history of success, both in Kazakhstan and abroad.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. And President Tokayev even, like, publicly acknowledged their success, saying everyone needs to accept this history of success, both in Kazakhstan and abroad.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I think that we all need to accept your history of success both in Kazakhstan and increasingly abroad. I wish you further success!, - said President Kassym-Zhomart Tokayev in response.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: That's a really strong endorsement. Sounds like Kazakhstan is really, uh, leading the charge in some of these areas.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's a really strong endorsement. Sounds like Kazakhstan is really, uh, leading the charge in some of these areas.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. It's quite the story.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. It's quite the story.
